channel.title: The D&G 5027
channel.description: D&G are an offshoot brand of Dolce & Gabbana. Started as a more modern, young and trendsetting label; this approach certainly shows in their glasses. D&G glasses are at the forefront of fashion, with sleek and modern designs that combine quality and style. The number one best selling frame in the D&G optical range is [...]

item.title: Glasses Online
item.description: A good place to go online for your basic glasses.

item.title: Spec Savers
item.description: This is a well trusted brand for getting cheap glasses and eye tests.
